text: Hi Kids!
Guess who's here
Yes it's me Bob..
Join me for learning street with Bob.
Kids, are you ready to learn all about colours today?
Yes Bob!
Then let’s go inside and pick out different food items in interesting colours.

Colours colours everywhere 
Look at them here And look at them there
So let’s find us a trolley and let’s skip along all jolly
Shiny, soft and deliciously round are these red tomatoes on the ground
Red… tomatoes. Red… tomatoes
They say one bright red apple a day Keeps the scary white doctors away
Red Red… apples. Red Red… apples

Blue toothpaste helps the teeth stay white
We brush with it twice morning and night
Blue toothpaste. Blue… toothpaste
Just pick a pen and fill it with ink my favorite color is blue not pink
Blue Blue… ink. Blue Blue… ink.

Its super leafy, and a pretty green
Spinach helps us get strong and lean
Green Green… spinach. Green Green… spinach
With lots of layers they sit tight Green cabbages are a great big bite
Green… cabbages. Green… cabbages.
Sunflowers turn their heads towards the sun they’re yellow, fresh and so much fun.
Yellow… sunflowers. Yellow… sunflowers

They love to dance merrily in the fields
Because that’s where the yellow daffodils yield
Yellow… daffodils. Yellow… daffodils

Orange carrots are good for your eyes
And they also make you very wise
Orange… carrots. Orange… carrots

They have the same name as the colour
Oranges are orange, like no other
Orange… carrots. Orange… carrots
Colours colours everywhere Look at them here And look at them there

Blue, green, yellow, orange and red
Hope it all stays in your head.
Yes Bob!
Now let’s get together another day to learn more colours in a brand new place
And you kids, stay tuned for a new set of colours.
Until then, see you later.
